misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his seventh appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami brings a calm and collected demeanor to the competition, often seen strategizing meticulously on the course. Despite his quiet nature, Sami's determination is evident in every swing.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Sami's consistent presence in the tournament speaks volumes about his dedication to the sport and his competitive spirit. He remains a player to watch, always capable of surprising his opponents with moments of brilliance.

Beyond the Hector Trophée, Sami regularly tests his skills on the Finnish Mid Tour, where he has achieved commendable results. This ongoing experience ensures that Sami arrives at each Hector Trophée event with a sharp game and a wealth of competitive experience.
